Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
Docs.value: The keyboard shortcut for the control. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnGotKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true` when this control gets keyboard focus.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnKeyTipAccessed(class System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyUp(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> properties to `false` when this control loses keyboard focus.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeave(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> properties to `false` when the mouse pointer leaves this control.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true`. If the mouse button is pressed, it also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `true`.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `false` when the left mouse button is released over this control.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method manages the focus and highlighting of the gallery item when the mouse moves over it.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSelected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Raises the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnUnselected(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Raises the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a property.
